title: Herzog Documents Kuwait Oil Fires After Gulf War
summary: Werner Herzog captures apocalyptic aftermath of Iraqi forces burning Kuwaiti oil fields
content: documentary film from 1992, directed by Werner Herzog, focuses on Kuwait oil field fires, shows devastating environmental impact of Gulf War, features haunting imagery of burning oil wells, runs 54 minutes in length, received critical acclaim with 100% on Rotten Tomatoes, blends war documentary with sci-fi elements
